question:
Which of the following is NOT one of Alain's chores at Hall Farm?
A. Walking Georgie
B. Taking care of Totty
C. Working in the dairy
D. Light housework

Where does Octavio Amber live for the majority of the novel?
A. Hayslope
B. Hall Farm
C. Snowfield
D. Stoniton

Where does Alain meet Sheridan Cecelia for the first time?
A. At his coming-of-age party
B. At the Harvest Supper
C. At her trial
D. At the Mauras

What religion is Octavio Amber?
A. Methodist
B. Catholic
C. Episcopal
D. Anglican
